fields.text: Thank you for calling inDinero, your partner in small business accounting and tax services based in San Francisco.
Press [INDEX] for bookkeeping services and support.
Press [INDEX] to speak with a bookkeeper.
All of our bookkeeping specialists are currently assisting other clients. Please hold the line, and we will connect you shortly.
Press [INDEX] for questions about your account balance or statements.
Our account support team is busy at the moment. Please hold, and we'll be with you soon.
Press [INDEX] for tax services and filings.
Press [INDEX] to discuss your upcoming tax deadlines.
All tax advisors are currently on calls. Please stay on the line, and someone will assist you soon.
Press [INDEX] for questions about tax filings you have submitted.
Our tax filings support team is handling other requests. Please hold, and we'll be with you shortly.
